name: Steel Graves
storyline: The story takes place several years in the future during the Great Galactic War between humankind and the aliens from planet Tartare. To fight the threat, spatial mega corporation NeoTerra colonizes the planets in the galaxy to steal the most valuable resource in the market : Orion's crystals. These crystals are the main food and energy of the aliens from Tartare.
summary: Steel Graves is a third person action-strategy game in solo and multiplayer. Take place in the conflict between the corporation Neoterra and the aliens from the planet Tartare. Fight on the battlefield, seize the resources and annihilate your enemy.
